Because of your past successes, you also have been the go-to guy for nearly everyone in the firm, and not being able to say "no," you agree to assist each one of them with their projects.

And therein lies the problem. You have recently bitten off more than you can chew so to speak, having too many projects and not enough time to split between them. Work is going undone, deadlines are being missed, and bosses from multiple divisions of the firm are getting upset. Even though it's not entirely your fault, you are the most visible member of each failing team and so usually take the brunt of the blame. Puncturing your rump with the fork, he begins carving slices of tender meat from your ample ass. Once he has depleted the meat from the right side of your rump, he sits down to enjoy the pile of girl meat before him. The first bite is so exquisite, a symphony of savory flavors teasing his taste buds and begging him to take another bite.

"Mmmmm..." he hums between bites. "My dear, you taste so good, and your meat just melts in my mouth..." That's all he can manage to say before he shoves another bite of your meat into his mouth.

By the time Dr. Labinnac has had his fill of your tender flesh, your entire rump, right thigh, and both breasts have been devoured. He sits back in his chair and pats his now satisfied stomach, smiling at the success of his new roasting suit.

"Well, that was the best girl I've eaten yet," he says to himself. "I can't wait to demonstrate the suit for the government. Maybe I'll get a spicy redhead to roast for the demo..."
145131211.title: Jennifer, Stuffed and Roasted

info.brief_description: Your family is preparing dinner tonight... with YOU as the main course!
info.description:
WARNING: This story contains themes of a sexual nature, specifically dealing with the fetish of fantasy erotic cannibalism. As such, this story may not be suitable for everyone and is especially not suitable for minors. If you are under the age of 18 (21 in some areas) or may be offended by this, please do not continue any further.

Note: If you enjoy this story or the topic in general, you can visit www.pulptoon.com for a treasure trove of additional cannibal/vore stories and art, much of which is available for free on their forums!

Background:
You live in a society plagued by overpopulation. As a solution to the population problem, the government has recently legalized and publicly endorsed a limited form of cannibalism. The practice has not become widespread yet, and most people in society do not wish to eat human meat or be roasted. But there are a few communities and families that are exceptions, embracing the idea of eating someone or being eaten.

In this story, your family just happens to be one of those families that is open to cannibalism, and they (or sometimes even people outside your family) think you would make the perfect meal. That being the case, it is expected that each branch of the story comes to an end with you having been eaten. However, how you meet that fate is up to you.

Main Characters:
Your family is made up of four main characters:
--Mark, age 44 and the father of the household. Mark works for an engineering firm and has a lot of skill building various equipment. He tends to travel a lot in his work.
--Sarah, age 42 and the mother of the household. Sarah is a stay-at-home mom and an excellent cook. She is both smart and attractive, and she often uses this to get what she wants.
--Pete, age 20 and the son. Pete is currently attending the local university and is halfway through his degree. He's moved out, but is awfully homesick and wishes to come back home to visit.
--Jennifer, age 18 and the daughter. Jennifer has just finished high school and is currently looking for an entry-level job.

Note:
After a bit of thinking, I've decided to change this story to disallow chapters from other readers. From the beginning, it was intended to be a story which I alone write, but for a long time I accepted new contributions from other readers as well. While I appreciate the effort of anyone who contributed, rules keep getting broken, and I tried to be lenient but it's just not working. Therefore, I will soon be deleting all chapters from other contributors. Please respect this decision and do not post new chapters in this story; they will be deleted as well. Thank you for your understanding, and enjoy the story!
